item.description:
Join NHCer Kevin to celebrate his birthday with a Day at the Beach! The following is a Message from Kevin:

"Greetings friends:

I invite you to join me in celebrating the first third of my life. (Or just come have fun on the beach.)

ME: I'll get there early and grab a spot. I'll have a couple tables, a little grill and a couple beef patties for the grill and maybe some beef franks. I'll be there until I get sick of being there or they kick us out.

YOU:
BYOE
Bring your own EVERYTHING
(Enough to share)

So...
If you want to eat... bring it!
If you want to drink... bring it!
If you want to sit... bring it!
If you want to play... bring it!

But if you want to give me a gift... LEAVE IT!!!

Seriously...

This is about all my friends coming together in one place and meeting each other and to marvel at how good I look for my age. ;)

So let me know if you're coming. Let me know what you're bringing to share. And let's chill for a minute.

RAIN DATE: JULY 11, 2012"

You Can find more information about Lighthouse Point Park  (In Example: Parking fees and such)  Here: http://www.cityofnewhaven.com/parks/parksinformation/lighthousepoint.asp

Kevin will post any additional details of how to find the group.  Come enjoy a summer day at Lighthouse Point!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Kevin's set up, he will post any additional contact information...
item.name: Kevin's Birthday as an Excuse for a Day at the Beach!
